mdRecord.dcterms:description: Swimming Pool building and Fred C. Greear Gymnasium, between 1980 and 1995

Established 1954 as Clinch Valley College of the University of Virginia, a two-year junior college, and the westernmost state-supported college in Virginia. Transitioned to a four-year college beginning 1970. Renamed The University of Virginiaâ€™s College at Wise, 1999. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University_of_Virginia%27s_College_at_Wise [work]
